title: Ghost Hunter Technology Revisited
itunes:title: Ghost Hunter Technology Revisited
description:
Modern ghost hunting relies heavily on the use -- or misuse -- of technology. Learn about EMF meters, what constitutes electronic voice phenomena, and why your "ghost host" thinks it's all a misunderstanding. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:keywords: ghosts, paranormal, supernatural, skeptic, skepticism, EMF, electromagnetic field, electricity, magnetism, electronic voice phenomena, EVP, ghost orb, backscatter, photography, double exposure, pareidolia, apophenia, psychology
